plot: A rural New Hampshire snow-plow driver (Paul Dooley) defies his wife (Anita Gillette) and buys a disco shirt at a yard sale. He then impulsively ignites an affair with the widow (Irene Roseen) of its previous owner.
title: Qiana
plot_es: A rural New Hampshire snow-plow driver (Paul Dooley) defies his wife (Anita Gillette) and buys a disco shirt at a yard sale. He then impulsively ignites an affair with the widow (Irene Roseen) of its previous owner.
